headline: Microsoft CEO drops blunt truth on AI
summary: Microsoft (MSFT) CEO Satya Nadella didn’t mince words in his appearance on the Bg2 Pod with investor Brad Gerstner and OpenAI’s Sam Altman. The tech leader made a startling admission that the biggest problem facing AI expansion right now isn’t chips — it’s power. In what was a rare moment of ...

headline: Microsoft (MSFT): Assessing Valuation Perspectives After Recent Share Price Dip
summary: Microsoft (MSFT) shares have seen mild movement following a routine trading session, with the stock dipping around 1%. Investors may be weighing recent performance as they look for catalysts to guide the next move higher or lower. See our latest analysis for Microsoft. Microsoft’s share price has cooled a bit recently, with a 1.43% dip in the latest session adding to a 4% decline over the past month, but longer-term momentum is still very much alive. headline: Infosys Develops AI Agent to Enhance Operations in the Energy Sector
summary: Infosys (NSE: INFY) (BSE: INFY) (NYSE: INFY), a global leader in next-generation digital services and consulting, has developed an AI Agent designed to digitally transform operations in the energy sector. This productivity solution leverages Infosys Topaz, an AI-first offering using generative AI technologies, Infosys Cobalt, a set of services, solutions and platforms for enterprises to accelerate their cloud journey, alongside Microsoft Copilot Studio, Azure OpenAI in Foundry Models, and ChatGP

headline: S&P 500 Futures Dip as Rate and Debt Worries Mount
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Thursday, Nov, 6 2025 US stock futures are pointing lower ahead of the open, as investors react to news that US household debt has climbed to a fresh all-time high and the 10-year Treasury yield has pushed to its highest level in a month. Signs of persistent borrowing and rising rates are stirring fresh concern about consumer resilience and the cost of credit, which is putting pressure on the broader equity market as investors weigh the trajectory...
